snippet.title: "HoloParade" Release PV
snippet.description:
A lively parade with hololive VTubers and mascot characters!

"HoloParade" is a fan game of hololive and the first title to serve as a test case for "holo Indie". Collect, nurture, and enjoy watching your favorite characters! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth, strategy, and can also be enjoyed casually.

Release Date: December 1st (Friday)
Price: $3.99 USD
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2647230/
Language: Japanese / English / Indonesian
(Available for Windows / Mac)

As a fan of hololive, and as a creator, I have put everything I have into the production.
Please definitely put it on your wishlist and wait!
For the latest updates, I will be posting through below X(twitetr) account, so if you're interested, please feel free to follow me.
https://twitter.com/roboqlo

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
What is "holo Indie"?:
It is a general term for a game brand for derivative work games, produced using the "game creator support program" with the aim of co-creating with fans and creators of hololive Production around the world.
